title: will the 2v2 magma chamber be back?
body:
i think riot should make the 2v2 magma chamber map playable again
is rito working on this??

also will there be anymore maps that are going to be released?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
GhostCrawler mentioned on stream today that there'll be a temporary game mode coming out soon (stay tuned!)

For that interview, check out the last hour of the [**leaguecommunity stream recording**](http://www.twitch.tv/leaguecommunity/v/36646900) :)

Magma Chamber was never available to the general public? I don't remember it ever being playable in client. Was only used at the All-Star Showdown in China to my knowledge.

I think if Riot does release a new map, it will be either temporary or a re-skin like Butcher's Bridge.
I think he means playable at all

Magma Chamber was never released to the public before, it was only played at All Stars. However Riot did release a 1v1/2v2 Showdown Map a few years ago. 

But, I think Magma Chamber is a really cool map and would love to play on it!
OH AND BRING BACK DA URF!
